metadata.title: CVE-2017-7472 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The KEYS subsystem in the Linux kernel before 4.10.13 allows local users tocause a denial of service (memory consumption) via a series ofKEY_REQKEY_DEFL_THREAD_KEYRING keyctl_set_reqkey_keyring calls.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7472` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-132-generic - 3.13.0-132.181
linux-image-3.13.0-132-generic-lpae - 3.13.0-132.181
